file_content.text: I will not allow this.
Not this time, Father.
Release me, Valkorion! I'll end her miserable life!
Let me go, and I'll kill her!
I am all that is keeping you alive.
When I'm done with your precious Outlander, you and Arcann are next.
Such hatred. You are my daughter. We are family.
You caged me like an animal!
You were a danger to yourself and others. I made you safe.
You feared what I would become... and you were right.
Kill me, and your father will be free to take another form. It might be you.
You'll only free Valkorion.
He's too weak, and he knows it.
Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
No, that's not...
Did you think I locked you away to punish you? No. You had to learn. You had to be... conditioned.
Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul!
What did you do to me?
If you fight, you will die.
I can't disarm the bomb with that shield in place! Take out the power relays!
Your daughter's even stronger than you.
Vaylin is invincible.
She is not. She is merely powerful.
When I'm done with your precious Outlander, you and Mother are next.
You need to prove yourself to a father who knows you're just a mistake. You're pathetic.
I don't fear pitiful things.
I am not a mistake.
That went well. Any other brilliant plans?
Well, that didn't work.
I am not finished.
If I die, the Alliance lives on. They'll never stop fighting.
The Alliance will prevail.
Good. I don't want to get bored.
Where's Vaylin?
She's gone! No time to explain.
Stop wasting time, and end her miserable life!
Kill her now, Valkorion!
Only you can strike her down.
